required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Assess Bioequivalence of Loratadine Oral Solution/Syrup Versus Claritin Peach Syrup
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-dose, Single-center, Randomized, Open-label, Two-way Crossover Study in Healthy Adults to Assess the Bioequivalence of Loratadine Oral Solution/Syrup 1mg/mL (GPLA Formula) Versus Claritin Peach Syrup 1mg/mL (ANNA Formula)

brief_summary.textblock: To assess the bioequivalence of Loratadine Oral Solution/Syrup 1mg/mL (GPLA Formula) versus Claritin Peach Syrup 1mg/mL (ANNA Formula)

primary_outcome.measure: Primary: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Zero to the Last Data Point Greater Than Lower Limit of Quantitation (LLOQ) of Loratadine in Plasma (AUC[0-tlast]) After Single Oral Dose of Loratadine
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve from zero to the last data point greater than (>) LLOQ (AUC[0-tlast]) after single dose.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax) of Loratadine in Plasma After Single Oral Dose of Loratadine
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed loratadine concentration in plasma, directly taken from analytical data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Concentration (tmax) in Plasma After Single Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Time to reach maximum loratadine concentration in plasma after its single oral dose, directly taken from analytical data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Zero to Infinity (AUC) of Loratadine in Plasma After Single Dose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve from zero to infinity after single dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Half-Life (t1/2) Associated With the Terminal Slope of Loratadine After Single Dose
secondary_outcome.description: Half-life associated with the terminal slope.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Body Clearance (CL/F) of Loratadine Calculated After its Single Oral Administration
secondary_outcome.description: Total body clearance of loratadine calculated after extravascular application.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) From the Last Calculated Data Point Greater Than Lower Limit of Quantification [LLOQ]) to Infinity (%AUC[tlast-∞]) After Single Oral Administration of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of AUC from the last calculated data point > LLOQ to infinity was measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Terminal Rate Constant (λz) of Loratadine After Single Dose
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent terminal rate constant, calculated from the slope of a log-linear regression of the unweighted data considering the last concentration-time points > LLOQ.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Zero to 72 Hours (AUC[0-72]) of Lloratadine in Plasma After Single Oral Dose
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve from zero to 72 h after single dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax) of Desloratadine in Plasma After Single Oral Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum observed desloratadine concentration in plasma, directly taken from analytical data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Concentration (tmax) of Desloratadine in Plasma After Single Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Time to reach maximum drug concentration in the measured matrix, directly observed from the analytical data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Zero to the Last Data Point Greater Than Lower Limit of Quantitation (LLOQ) of Desoratadine in Plasma (AUC[0-tlast]) After Single Oral Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve from zero to the last data point > LLOQ (AUC[0-tlast]) after single dose.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve From Zero to 72 Hours (AUC[0-72]) of Desloratadine in Plasma After Single Oral Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration versus time curve from zero to 72 h after single dose. AUC and residual area were not evaluated because the concentration at 72 h was quantifiable in the majority of profiles.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of Last Concentration Above the Lower Limit Of Quantitation (LLOQ) of Desloratadine, Directly Taken From Analytical Data (tlast)
secondary_outcome.description: Time of last concentration above LLOQ, directly taken from analytical data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Half-Life (t1/2) Associated With the Terminal Slope of Desoratadine After Single Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Half-life associated with the terminal slope.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Area Under the Concentration Versus Time Curve (AUC) from the Last Data Point Greater Than Lower Limit of Quantitation (LLOQ) to Infinity (%AUC[tlast-∞]) of Desoratadine After Single Oral Administration of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of area under the concentration versus time curve from zero to the last data point > LLOQ in plasma (AUC[(0-tlast]) was measured.

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Terminal Rate Constant (λz) of Desoratadine After Single Dose of Loratadine
secondary_outcome.description: Apparent terminal rate constant, calculated from the slope of a log-linear regression of the unweighted data considering the last concentration-time points > LLOQ.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Loratadine oral solution/syrup then Claritin peach syrup
arm_group.description: Subjects received a single oral dose of 10 mg loratadine-oral solution/syrup 1 mg/mL (GPLA formula, test formulation) under fasted condition in treatment period 1, followed by a single oral dose of 10 mg loratadine-claritin peach syrup 1 mg/mL (ANNA formula, reference formulation) under fasted condition in treatment period 2. A wash-out period of at least 10 calendar days was maintained between the 2 treatments.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Claritin peach syrup then Loratadine oral solution/syrup
arm_group.description: Subjects received a single oral dose of 10 mg loratadine-claritin peach syrup 1 mg/mL (ANNA formula, reference formulation) under fasted condition in treatment period 1, followed by a single oral dose of 10 mg loratadine-oral solution/syrup 1 mg/mL (GPLA formula, test formulation) under fasted condition in treatment period 2. A wash-out period of at least 10 calendar days was maintained between the 2 treatments.

intervention.description: Subjects received a single oral dose of 10 mg loratadine oral solution/syrup 1 mg/mL (GPLA formula, test formulation) under fasted condition in any intervention period.
intervention.arm_group_label: Loratadine oral solution/syrup then Claritin peach syrup
Claritin peach syrup then Loratadine oral solution/syrup

intervention.description: Subjects received a single oral dose of 10 mg loratadine claritin peach syrup 1 mg/mL (ANNA formula, reference formulation) under fasted condition in any intervention period.
intervention.arm_group_label: Loratadine oral solution/syrup then Claritin peach syrup
Claritin peach syrup then Loratadine oral solution/syrup
